articles.title: Local Boy Unmutes Himself
articles.author: Tim Wit
articles.description: In a stunning turn of events, a very competent programmer remembers to press the 'unmute' button before speaking on Zoom.

articles.title: Fluff Daddy
articles.author: F. Diddy
articles.description: Breaking: Puff Daddy changes his name yet again, this time to help promote his line of extremely fluffy coats

articles.title: Raffy so cute
articles.author: Mr. Rafferty
articles.description: Raffy continues to be a fluffy boy.

articles.title: Free Ice Cream
articles.author: Sherbert Con√©
articles.description: In determination to increase global happiness, the University is planning their ice cream for all intiative on campus tomorrow at noon. Every day from 9:00 AM to Midnight, Yalies will be able to pick up as much free ice cream as they desire from now until forever more.

articles.title: What does the fox say?
articles.author: National Geographic
articles.description: Ylvis says, 'But there's one sound that no one knows. What does the fox say? Ring-ding-ding-ding-dingeringeding! Gering-ding-ding-ding-dingeringeding! Gering-ding-ding-ding-dingeringeding! What the fox say? Wa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pow! Wa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pow! Wa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pa-pow! What the fox say?'

articles.title: Discovery: Foxes love leaping
articles.author: Leslie Fox
articles.description: Did you know that foxes love to leap? Well, not many people did because it was just discovered!
